name: Dr. Wanderwaffle
description:
Doctor Wanderwaffle has to cure his patients in order to keep his office open.

Approach to your patients to know what happens to them. Through your treatment panel you will be able to know how to cure them. Once yoyu know how to treat them, take your medical utensils and heal them.

But be careful, the time is short and you cannot make any mistakes. 

Are you ready?

El Doctor Wanderwaffle tiene que curar a sus pacientes para poder mantener su consulta abierta.

Acércate a tus pacientes para poder saber que les ocurre. A través de tu panel de tratamientos vas a poder saber como curarlos. Una vez sepas como tratarles coge tus utensilios médicos y sanarlos.

Pero ve con cuidado el tiempo es corto y no puedes cometer errores. ¿Te atreverás?

Controls:

  • TAB : Treatment Panel
  • W/A/S/D: Move
  • SPACE: Catch / Give / Drop

Controles:

  • TAB :  Panel de tratamiento
  • W/A/S/D: Para desplazarse
  • SPACE: Para coger / dar / soltar

 #SGDJam 

- Diego Bellino  ( Programmer)

- Elna Cabot (Artist 2D / 3D) https://elnacp.itch.io/
